::Spears::

She looked at Prebon.  "I"m sorry that you lost your friend. But if 
yu still have the spark, and if that friend means that much to you," 
she stopped and swallowed hard.  She didn't reall know what she was 
abut o say next, but knew only that is might make Prebon happy,"you 
can use my form for your friend.  If it would please you Master 
Prebon, Put my spark on sustained life and give my form to your 
friend."  SHe looked at him and honestly showed her caring for Prebon.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Prebon smiled
> 
> "Than I shall tell you one. I will keep it short since we do not 
have 
> much time. It was about 30 Earth years ago. I had just started The 
> Trainers. It was myself, Hammer, Blaze, a bot named Blackstar, and 
> than there was Lightrade. Lightrade was special. We were very 
close. 
> He had been my best friend since I could remember. He and I always 
> did things together, and kept together in the good times and the 
bad. 
> We had been at war for awhile against another rogue faction named 
the 
> Bultak, lead by our current Trainer Bullet. We were fighting over 
the 
> Bultak's moon base, because it was very important to our 
domination. 
> We finaly went all out and attacked. During the battle, Bullet 
> damaged Lightrade immensly. There was nothing I could do to save 
the 
> body. But the spark.....I stored it. I put it in a life-sustaining 
> and have been keeping it all these years. I told him the first 
chance 
> I got a fresh body, I would put his spark back. I would've put him 
in 
> Striker's but Striker's spark was still there, it just needed 
> programing. I made Bullet pay the ultimae price: I captured him and 
> wiped his memory, making him join us. Eventually he started taking 
> over Blackstar's work, and she didn't like that so she left us. We 
> met Ignatius a few months later, and there we are. Our current 
> Trau=iners. What do you think?"
